name: Rotom-2.0
description: [Rotom-2.0](https://telegram.me/MadBoy_Rotomgram2_Bot) is a actually a bot developed by [@Warning_MadBoy_is_Here](https://telegram.me/Warning_MadBoy_is_Here) on basis of @RotomgramBot(https://telegram.me/RotomgramBot), which acts as a helper for trainers on Telegram. You can check information of Pokémon, Showdown usage and check effectiveness; weakness of Pokémon types as quickly as possible, without ever leaving the app
